articles.author: Judy Stone
articles.title: What’s Causing A Sudden Outbreak Of Hepatitis In Kids In Europe And The US? - Forbes
articles.description: Outbreaks of severe hepatitis (liver inflammation) are being seen in children younger than 10 in Europe and Alabama. The question is why?
articles.content: A photomicrograph of hepatitis, this time caused by the Lassa virus, using toluidine-blue azure II ... [+] stain, magnified 315X, 1972. Image courtesy CDC/Dr. W. Winn. (Photo by Smith Collection/Gado… [+3210 chars]

articles.author: Mike Stobbe
articles.title: Mysterious liver illness seen in kids in US, Europe - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Health officials in several countries are investigating mysterious cases of severe liver disease in children, and they think it may be related to a kind of virus usually associated with colds.
articles.content:

articles.title: Canadian soldiers depart to help humanitarian crisis in Europe - CBC.ca
articles.description: Dozens of Canadian soldiers boarded a plane to Poland Friday for what their commander said would be an intense but gratifying mission to help Ukrainians fleeing Russian aggression.
